name: KYCDAO
intro: Multichain platform for issuing reusable, onchain KYC verifications
introduce: kycDAO is a multichain platform for issuing reusable, onchain KYC verifications. kycDAO links a verification to a connected wallet address and enables users to mint a KYC NFT (a non-transferable or soulbound NFT). KYC NFTs which unlock novel usecases in web3 including trusted communities, fair voting and DAO governance, DeFi, cryptonative on and off ramps for fiat, artist, team, or founder verification, and pseudoanonymous fundraising and investment.
